name: BMBR by FeCO
description:
##############################

 BASIC 10 Liners Contest 2021

           BMBR

Commodore BASIC V3.5 release

programmed on Commodore 16

final mods with Yape    

written by: FeCO

gorunrma@yahoo.com

##############################

INSTRUCTIONS:

You have to ruin those abadoned buildings, because your jet have to emergency landing.

Press space to release a bomb. Sometimes one is enough, sometimes you have to drop more.

Good luck Captain!

Recommended emulator:  YAPE

CONTROLS:

SPACE: Bomb

at the end: any key pressed restrarts the game.

CODE DESCRIPTIONS:

0: Jet and buildings datas 

1: Ground

2-3: Make the buildings

4-5: Fly the jet around

7: Collision detecion and checkin fire-button-press

8: Bomb falling

9: Final controls
